phenophase.phenophase_definition: One or more breaking leaf buds are visible on the plant.  A leaf bud is considered 'breaking' once a green leaf tip is visible at the end of the bud, but before the first leaf from the bud has unfolded to expose the leaf stalk (petiole) or leaf base.

One or more breaking leaf buds are visible on the plant.  A leaf bud is considered 'breaking' once a green leaf tip is visible at the end of the bud, but before the first leaf from the bud has unfolded to expose the leaf stalk (petiole) or leaf base.

external.filterDisclaimer: For quality assurance purposes, only onset dates that are preceded by negative records are included in the visualization.
